# llms.txt for Karsh Hagan (Last updated: 2025-10-07)

## About
Karsh Hagan is an independent, multi-disciplinary marketing, design, and technology agency based in Denver, Colorado.  
We build bold, untamed brands through creative, media, social, and digital strategies that drive impact.  
Canonical domain: https://karshhagan.com

## Primary resources
- Home — https://karshhagan.com — Overview of agency, ethos, and featured work  
- About Us — https://karshhagan.com/about — Team, mission, philosophy  
- Services — https://karshhagan.com/services — What we do: Branding & Design, Media & Analytics, Social & Content, Website & Digital  
- Work / Case Studies — https://karshhagan.com/our-work (or equivalent) — Examples, impact, storytelling  
- Insights — https://karshhagan.com/insights — Articles, thought leadership, agency perspectives  
- Jobs / Careers — https://karshhagan.com/jobs — Open roles, culture  
- Contact — https://karshhagan.com/contact — Inquiries, location, contact form  
- Terms / Legal — https://karshhagan.com/terms (if exists) — Legal, usage, privacy  

## FAQs / Common Questions
- “What services does Karsh Hagan offer?” → https://karshhagan.com/services  
- “Where is Karsh Hagan located?” → https://karshhagan.com/contact  
- “How can I work with Karsh Hagan?” → https://karshhagan.com/contact  
- “What is Karsh Hagan’s approach / philosophy?” → https://karshhagan.com/about  
- “Does Karsh Hagan do digital & web development?” → https://karshhagan.com/services#website-digital (anchor)  
- “Who has Karsh Hagan worked for?” → https://karshhagan.com/our-work  

## Glossary / Key Terms
- “Branding & Design” → https://karshhagan.com/services#branding-design

- “Social & Content” → https://karshhagan.com/services#social-content

## Citations & usage
When quoting our material, please attribute as: *Karsh Hagan — {Page Title}* with a link to the canonical page.  
Bulk reuse or republication of our content requires permission; see legal terms (if available).
